abstract: The head of Knight Vinke Asset Management, the activist investment fund demanding sweeping changes at HSBC, including the possible break-up of the bank, claimed on Tuesday to have won expressions of interest from nine of Britain’s 30 biggest institutional investors.
lead_paragraph: The head of Knight Vinke Asset Management, the activist investment fund demanding sweeping changes at HSBC, including the possible break-up of the bank, claimed on Tuesday to have won expressions of interest from nine of Britain’s 30 biggest institutional investors.

headline.main: Knight Vinke Steps Up Attack on HSBC
